import React, { Component } from 'react' import './App.css' import '../assets/css/bootstrap.min.css' import '../assets/css/font-awesome.css' import next from '../assets/images/next.svg' import back from '../assets/images/back.svg' import phone from '../assets/images/mail_white.svg' import dcl from '../assets/mockups/DCL.png' import safe from '../assets/mockups/SAFE.png' import covid from '../assets/mockups/Covid.png' import sparq from '../assets/mockups/SparQ.png' import sayblue from '../assets/mockups/SAYBLUE.png' import verve from '../assets/mockups/VERVE.png' import space from '../assets/mockups/SPACE.png' import enbridge from '../assets/mockups/Enbridge.png' import fiscal from '../assets/mockups/FiscalFresh.png' import blc from '../assets/mockups/BLC.png' import Slider from "react-slick"; import "slick-carousel/slick/slick.css"; import "slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css"; function NextArrow(props) { const { className, style, onClick } = props; return ( ); } function PrevArrow(props) { const { className, style, onClick } = props; return ( ); } export class PortSlider extends Component { render() { var settings = { dots: false, infinite: true, speed: 500, autoplay: true, arrows:true, draggable: false, nextArrow: , prevArrow: , autoplaySpeed: 2000, pauseOnHover: true, responsive: [{ breakpoint: 900, settings: { autoplay: true, arrows: false, autoplaySpeed: 4000, slidesToShow: 1, speed: 2000, slidesToScroll: 1, initialSlide: 2 } }], slidesToShow: 3, slidesToScroll: 1 }; return (

Our Work

Space Hour Logger

This web application keeps track of 1000+ simultaneous volunteers putting together any type of event. Features User, Manager, and Admin sign-in with different access levels.

View Project

Biotech Leadership Consulting

Biotech Leadership Consulting, LLC provides management consulting on bringing diverse experts together into a high performing team.

View Project

COVID-19 Dashboard

Dashboard redesign for tracking COVID-19, displaying all necessary information condensely sorted by selecting a specific country or region.

View Project

Enbridge Dashboard

This web application keeps track of 100+ ongoing engineering projects at Enbridge Gas Distribution with ability to search,filter and create new views.

View Project

SAFE Dentistry

Start-up aiming to reduce the risk of infection within dental clinics by delivering a customized infection prevention and control audit program for dental offices and staff.

View Project

Distributed Compute Labs

A Canadian educational nonprofit organization responsible for developing the next-generation of computing networks.

View Project

Fiscal Fresh

Similar to services like "Hello Fresh", Fiscal Fresh is a webapp for finding recipes and delivering the ingredients to your house making use of local grocery delivery services.

View Project

SparQ Studios

SparQ Studios is a maker space and design studio that provides a wide range of tools, machinery, knowledge, and expertise so that you can bring your idea into a physical form.

View Project

Verve Group Consulting

New Jerseyâ€™s premier source for affordably designed and managed legal projects. An invaluable resource for both growing companies and legal professionals.

View Project
